[\[10b.1\]]med cing tshor ba btang snyoms kyi dbang po khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi sbyangs nas/_dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /_lhan cig skyes dga' khyab pa'i dus kyi tshe/_bde ba rtog pa med pa yin pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched lha'i rang bzhin no/_/de rang gi lus la zhi gnas kyi sangs rgyas
[\[10b.2\]]bzhugs pas gzhan du gang na'ang sangs rgyas med kyang mi shes pas sangs rgyas 'dod do/_/sems de'i stong pa nyid ni lus la gnas kyang lus las ma skyes pa yin te/_kun du brtags pa nub nas rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin la/_gzhan gyi dbang nub nga kun du rtog pa thams cad
[\[10b.3\]]nub pa yin no/_/mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas dngos po kun la khyab cing lus la gnas kyang glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pas ma skyes pa yin no/_/de skad du yang /_'tshe ba med dang yang dag don/_/ngo bo nyid la phyin log gis/_/'bad du zin kyang mi zlogs shing /_/
[\[10b.4\]]blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro/_/zhes bshad do/_/des na rang rig 'od gsal ba las ni phung po lnga'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen byed la glo bur gyi rtog pa phung po lngas ni sems 'od gsal ba'i rkyen mi byed do/_/des na rang rig pa 'od gsal bas ni nyams su myong ba'i rgyu rkyen las skye'i glo bur
[\[10b.5\]]gyi rnam par rtog pa las mi skye'o/_/des na 'bad du zin kyang glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pas mi zlogs pa de la bde ba chen po zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos zhi gnas kyi bde ba'i rten rtsa du mchis zhes zhus pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa
[\[10b.6\]]gtso mo brgya nyi shu bstan pa dang /_spyi gtsug gi byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa lus thams cad la khyab pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan la/_rtsa rnams kyang dbyibs kyis mtshon nas ming gi brdar btags pa ni gnyis yin te/_bde mchog dang sbyar nas gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi/_'khor lo
[\[10b.7\]]gsum dang /_bu ga dgu'i rtsa dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rten bshad pa yin no/_/dgyes pa rdo rje dang sbyar nas ra sa nA dang la la nA dang /_a wa d+hU tI gsum gsum ni gtso bo yin la/_mi phyed pa ni rdo rje bdag med ma yin zhing /_de la rtsa sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin pas na
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]rtsa bzhir snang ba yin no/_/gzhan lha mo bco lnga ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis dang ldan pa yin pas na rtsa gnyis gnyis su 'jog pa yin pa 'am yang na rgyu 'bras bu gnyis dang ldan pa yin no/_/yang na sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang sbyar nas/_rigs drug gi rten
[\[11a.2\]]he ru ka dang ldan pas na rtsa drug lnga sum cu tham pa yin la/_ra sa nA dang /_la la nA ni dbus kyi gtso bo he ru ka'i sku gsum dang ldan par ston pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das la rtsa de dag gi rang bzhin zhus pa ni/_srid pa gsum po thams cad kyi lus rtsar snang yang bsam gtan gyi bde
[\[11a.3\]]ba rtog med skyes pa'i dus su rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa brgyad cu po mtshan mo'i sgras bstan pa dang /_'dzin pa'i rtog pa brgyad cu'i nyin mo'i brdar bstan pa dang bral ba yin no/_/bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba ni rnam par rtog pa rnams spangs pa la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i ye shes
[\[11a.4\]]'dus ma byas pa ste/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /_ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin lus/_/'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o//_//de ltar sems snang ba dang bcas pa'i rab tu byed pa bshad
[\[11a.5\]]nas/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong nyams su blang ba bstan pa ni/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_gsang chen bde ba'i zhi gnas kyi bde ba dang /_ye shes bla na med pa lhag mthong gi rang bzhin dang /_bla na med pa'i snying po nyams su blang ba'i thabs gsungs pa yin no/_/
[\[11a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud thams cad kyi snying po nyams su blang ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong /_rnam shes dang ye shes kyi sgron ma rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa yin no/_/de la dang po gleng gzhi'i don bstan
[\[11a.7\]]pa ni gsang ba dga' ba dang /_mchog dga' dang /_dgyes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /_ston pa'i gtso bo bdag nyid dus rtag tu bzhugs so/_/ston pa'i gtso bo gang yin zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste/_/rigs lnga'i rang
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bzhin he ru ka_/rdo rje sems dpa' longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bde mchog dang /_chos skus bdud bzhi bcom zhing zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor te ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang /_glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pas mi bskyod pas na brtan zhing mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bar du mi chod
[\[11b.2\]]pas na rtag pa nyid de spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/rtag tu da ltar byung ba dang /_/zhes pa ni myong ba 'ba' zhig dus gsum dang bral bas na der snang ba tsam ste/_he ni rgyu tshogs spangs pa dang /_/ru ni bkod pa dang bral bas/_/ka ni gang du 'ang mi gnas pas/_/zhes 'byung bas dus
[\[11b.3\]]gsum gyis stong pas dngos dang rjes thams cad du chos kyi dbyings las mi bzhengs pas na rang bzhin gyis ni 'da' dka' ba'o/_/de ltar sku gsum bstan nas/_da ni bshad pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ste/_sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/_/zhes pa ni thabs
[\[11b.4\]]lnga dang shes rab lnga mnyam par sbyor ba'o/_/sna tshogs cho ga 'dod rnams la/_/zhes bya ba ni/_bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /_rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang 'dod pa la/_de lta de ltar ston cing ston pa pos sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas gdul bya bzhin du rgyud dgu rdzogs par mdzad pa
[\[11b.5\]]yin no/_/de yang khyad par ci lta bu zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan g.yo zhes bya ba smos te/_sangs rgyas kun ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzugs su snang ba'o/_/dngos po kun du 'di 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can du snang ba'o/_/de nyid kyang gang
[\[11b.6\]]zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya dang /_thabs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang lus bde ba dang yid bde ba dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin brgyad cu gzung ba mtshan mor snang ba dang /_'dzin pa ni nyin mor
[\[11b.7\]]snang ba'i rtog pa rnams dang bral bas na/_bde ba rtog pa med pa yul dang yul can ro gcig pa'i zhi gnas kyi mnyam par sbyor ba dang /_bde ba sgyu ma lta bu dang stong pa nyid ro gcig pa'i lhag mthong gi mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir ro/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/_/zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i dra ba las
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]byang chub kyi sems sdom pas dbyings dang rlung gi dra ba las sngags kyi rang bzhin dang /_stong pa nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin sdom pas sems kyi sdom pa chos kyi rang bzhin no/_/sdom pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bde mchog la bya'o/_/de ltar tshigs bcad
[\[12a.2\]]gcig gis zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong gi rgyud thabs bstan nas/_da ni sgyu ma bde ba'i thabs yin par ston te/_sgyu ma bde ba 'di yis ni/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sgyu ma de gang zhe na/_mkha' 'gro ma dra ba bde ba'i mchog go/_/rnam pa du zhe na/_thams cad du ni sna tshogs mchog_/ces bya
[\[12a.3\]]ste/_phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas yul thams cad du dngos po bde ba sna tshogs pa gzung 'dzin dang bral bas na mchog ste/_su'i zhe na/_sems can kun gyi don du'o/_/ji lta bu zhe na/_bla na med par ro/_/thabs gang gis she na/_sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas grub/_/ces gsungs te/_tshogs
[\[12a.4\]]kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas lnga dang /_dpa' bo thams cad dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas gdul bya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la mos pa la gzugs sdug pa dang /_sgra snyan pa dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_ro mngar ba dang reg bya yid du 'ong pa'i bar gyis
[\[12a.5\]]gdul bya 'dul bar grub po/_/de skad du yang /_skye bo 'dod chags can don du/_/'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems/_/zhes gsungs so/_/mnyam sbyor las kyang /_bskal pa bye ba grangs med snyed/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ma mthong la/_/phyag rgya'i sbyor ba gang dag gis/_/tshe 'di nyid kyis
[\[12a.6\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/de ni bdag gis bstan par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos bde ba'i mchog_/ces gsungs so/_/da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig ston te/_rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes nas/_/zhes bya ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'i gzugs spangs nas chags pa chen po'i gzugs
[\[12a.7\]]su bsgyur te/_las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i dbye bas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin shes par byed pa'o/_/de yang du zhe na/_ma dang sring mo dang bu mo dang tsha mo ste bzhi dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang bram ze'i rigs dang dmangs rigs te bzhi dang /_bcu gnyis ma dang /_bcu drug ma dang /_nyi
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]shu ma dang /_nyi shu rtsa bzhi ma ste bzhi dang /_sngags skyes ma dang /_zhing skyes ma dang /_las las skyes ma dang /_ye shes las skyes ma ste/_bzhi dang bcu drug go/_/de dag ni bud med kyi sgyu mas grub ces bya ste/_sgyu mar khyad par med kyang /_bde ba'i sgyu ma ni sgyu ma rnams kyi mchog yin te/_
[\[12b.2\]]des sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya'i brdar btags nas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir de la mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya zhe na/_sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis yod de/_DA yi sgra las mkha' 'gro zhes/_/'dir ni khams la rnam par brtag_/ces bya ba'i tshigs
[\[12b.3\]]bcad phyed kyis de'i a ka sa ma zhes bya ba'i sgra'i khams kyis sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no/_/'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni zhi gnas rtog med kyi nam mkha' gzugs med pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi rtogs na rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'o/_/yang sa bcu gcig gi chos kyi dbyings stong pa
[\[12b.4\]]nyid rtogs shing rgyu bas mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya'o/_/de ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i nges tshig bshad nas/_da ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye ba bshad de/_kun du sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/_/kun du yid 'ong bde mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi lha mo dbang gi lha mo dang /_dpa' bo'i lha
[\[12b.5\]]mo dang /_bkas gnang ba dang /_de 'og ma lus kun spyod ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/kun du sna tshogs bde mchog ni/_/sems 'dzin pa'i yan lag dang /_dbang bskur ba'i yan lag dang /_tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa dang /_mchod pa'i yan lag go/_/de yang dbye na du zhe na/_rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid
[\[12b.6\]]dang /_/zhes bya ba smos te/_rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs yin la/_de las byung ba he ru ka'i rigs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do/_/pad+ma ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs yin la/_pad+ma 'dzin pa ni las kyi rigs yin no/_/nor bu'i rigs ni rin po che'i rigs yin la/_nor bu 'dzin pa ni rin po che'i
[\[12b.7\]]rigs yin no/_/de ltar na rigs drug ka'i rang bzhin du 'di rnams snang ba yin no/_/yang na rdo rje pad+ma dang nor bu chos kyi dbyings dang so sor rtog pa dang /_me long lta bu yin la/_'dzin pa gsum ni stong pa nyid gsum dang ldan pa yin no/_/de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te/_gnas dben
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]zhing yid du 'ong bar dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsags nas bsnyen bsgrub bzhis ji lta ba bzhin du sbyang ba byas pa 'am/_yang na gdong brnyan gon la lha'i cha byad bzung nas/_gzugs rdo rje ma dang /_sgra rdo rje ma dang /_dri rdo rje ma dang /_ro rdo rje ma dang /_
[\[13a.2\]]reg bya rdo rje ma rnams la/_gzugs 'dzin gyi rnam par spangs nas/_dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa zhi gnas kyi sems gzung ngo /_/de skad du yang /_dbugs dbyung bar ma ro mchog dang /_/dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang /_/rnal 'byor pas dus
[\[13a.3\]]rtag khyab par/_/rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_mnyam sbyor las kyang /_lha la dmigs par byed pa dag_/rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/_/rang gi dam tshig dam sbyor ba/_/mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/gzugs brnyan lus la sogs pa
[\[13a.4\]]las/_/rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems la rab brtson na/_/de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs pa rgyu rkyen tshogs kyi 'khor lo las bsam gtan dang po lta bu'i bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar zhi gnas kyi thabs bshad nas/_da ni lhag mthong bshad
[\[13a.5\]]par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor zil gyis gnon cing rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dang bral ba'o/_/bde ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'o/_/byang chub sems 'di gsungs zhes bya ba ni don dam byang chub kyi sems so/_/de'i rnam pa gang zhe na/_
[\[13a.6\]]stong pa ma yin mi stong min/_/dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/_/zhes bya ba la/_stong pa ni kun du brtags pas stong pas kun brtags mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/mi stong ni gzhan dbang skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'o/_/dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa ni yongs su grub pa don dam pa ngo bo nyid
[\[13a.7\]]med pa dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa'o/_/stong pa ma yin pa ni gong bu'i gzugs las 'das pa'o/_/mi stong min ni dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin zhes bya'o/_/yang na chags dang chags bral ba/_/lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs te/_/de skad du yang mnyam sbyor
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]las/_/chags med chags dang bral ba med/_/dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/_/bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/_/'di ni gnyis med theg pa'ang mchog_/ces bshad do/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i stong pa nyid do/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid thabs sbyor bas/_/zhes bya ba
[\[13b.2\]]ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/snying rje'i thabs kyis mdzes pa ni/_/zhes bya ba ni bde ba sgyu ma lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/shes rab pha rol phyin gsal 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa ste/_zung du 'jug pa'i don yin no/_/rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la/_/dngos po med cing
[\[13b.3\]]bsgom pa med/_/ces bya ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med cing bsgom bya dang sgom byed dang bral bas sems gzhag pa'o/_/de skad du yang /_de las che mchog gzhan med pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des/_/chos 'di nyid la mi 'grub
[\[13b.4\]]med/_/ces gsungs so/_/mi rtog lhag par mos par bya/_/rtog pa kun gyis lhag par brtag_/ces bya ba ni seng ge'i phru gu lta bu'am/_zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu'am/_skar khung gi gsang lta bur phyogs gcig gi stong pa nyid la mngon sum gyis bsgom pa'o/_/de lta bu'i thabs
[\[13b.5\]]sus mdzad ce na bde bar gshegs pas mngon sum gyi lam 'di/_rnam par mi rtog chos rnams la/_/sems can don du rab tu brtags/_/zhes bya ste/_phyag rgya bzhi'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yin te/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ba'o/_/
[\[13b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag mchog_/chos can med cing chos nyid med/_/ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid do/_/chos dang chos can dang chos nyid dang rnam pa gsum med par bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'o/_/de ltar yin na ni ji ltar chos gsung bar 'gyur te/_brag ca
[\[13b.7\]]sgra dang mtshungs pa yi/_/de nas chos kyi gsung 'di 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba bstan to/_/de ltar sku gsum gyi don shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rgyas par 'grub par
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de ltar lhag mthong bshad nas nyams su blang ba'i don bstan pa ni bstod cing phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa yin no/_/'gro ba sgrol byed sprul pa'i sku'o/_/sems can bdag skyes ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sgo nas so/_/rmongs pa gcod byed ni
[\[14a.2\]]chos kyi sku'i sgo nas so/_/de nyid gcig pu ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i sgo nas so/_/chos kun gcig pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi don no/_/dbang po drug gi lam gyur pa/_/zhes bya ba ni mchan bcas kyi yul lnga la dga' bzhi de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba'o/_/
[\[14a.3\]]mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rjes kyi rnal 'byor la/_dngos gzhi bzhin du mnyam par bzhag pa dang ro mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/yang na dbang po gang gi lam sems kyi bde ba chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rgyas btab pas/_bde ba chen po de dang de'i rang bzhin du 'gro ste/_mnyam
[\[14a.4\]]par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa gnyis khyad par med pas dngos rjes bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ro mnyam par bsgom pa dang mi bsgom pa med pa'o/_/des na/_gang phyir dngos kun bdag nyid ni/_/rnam shes phung por bstan pa yin/_/zhes bya ste/_dbang bzhi yi ni sems
[\[14a.5\]]kyi chos nyid shes pas chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de skyes bu blun po tha shal gyis shes par ma nus so/_/thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus sam zhe na/_phyogs gzhan 'ga' dang 'ga' gzhan gyi yin te/_thams cad kyang bde ba chen po 'dod pa la gzhol
[\[14a.6\]]ba 'ba' zhig go/_/de gang zhe na/_chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste sems rnam par shes pa drug gam brgyad kyi rang bzhin te/_khams gsum pa de'i rang bzhin du shes pas grol bar 'dod pa'am/_sems las byung ba dad pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i sgo nas
[\[14a.7\]]grol bar 'dod pa'i sems rnam bcas dang rnam med kyi sgo nas/_shes bya bye brag tu smra ba dang /_mdo sde pa'i sgo nas so/_/rgyu ni rjes su dpag pa dang /_'bras bu ni spyod pa dang bya ba dang /_gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi sgo nas so/_/chos can ni don dam sgyu ma lta bu'i sgo nas dang /_
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]chos nyid ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i sgo nas thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsgom par 'dod pa yang chu bo chen po rnam pa bzhi ru chu bran lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lan tshwa'i ror gcig tu gyur pa bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' du ma de dag kyang don dam par bde ba chen po la du
[\[14b.2\]]ma nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir thar pa ni gcig kho na yin no/_/ji ltar gang gis sems kyi stong nyid shes she na/_kha nang du bltas pa'i tha ma'i lam gyis so/_/rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o//_//de ltar bde mchog la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor gyi gleng gzhi bstan
[\[14b.3\]]nas/_da ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'i gleng gzhi bshad par bya ste/_rgyud rnams kun gyis nges pa ste/_/gru gsum shin tu yangs pa'i gzugs/_/zhes bya ba ni phyogs gcig rtogs pas zhi gnas kyi rtogs pa bde ba med pa'am phyogs gcig gi gang zag gi bdag 'gags
[\[14b.4\]]sam/_nyan thos sam rang rgyal ba'i bdag med pa'am/_phyogs gcig gi nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bas byang chub sems dpa'i stong nyid mtha' dag dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi stong nyid ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong yin la/_kun rdzob tu e gru gsum
[\[14b.5\]]gzhal yas khang ngam zla ba'am pad+ma'am/_btsun mo'i gru gsum b+ha ga'i gzugs su kun rdzob tu snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su gyur pa yin la/_don dam par de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzung ba'i yul las 'das shing 'dzin pa med pas na
[\[14b.6\]]srog chags thams cad kyi dbus na bzhugs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i thabs kun rdzob ston pa phun sum tshogs par snang ba ste/_mdor na thabs dang shes rab kyi don rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas na thabs dang shes rab ston pa'i phyir gleng gzhi
[\[14b.7\]]bstan pa yin no/_/de yang mngon sum du ma rtogs pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du goms pa yin la/_mngon sum gyi lam gyis tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/_lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'am/_dngos grub bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gleng gzhi mdor
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bsdus pa bstan nas sems 'od gsal ba yin yang glo bur gyi dri ma 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'khor bar 'ching zhing /_sdug bsngal gyis 'joms par byed cing sems de'i las dge mi dges bcings nas dmigs pa dang ldan pa de srid
[\[15a.2\]]du slar yang sdig pa sna tshogs pas khams gsum du 'khor zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dang po'i 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid bshad nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas dpa' bo ni zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'i lam rjes su mthun pa'i stobs ston te ji lta bu zhe na 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung ba'o/_/
[\[15a.3\]]dgos pa ci'i phyir zhe na/_sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i phyir te/_thabs gang gis she na/_sprul pa'i sku byin rlabs kyi lam dang /_rig pa'i mngon sum gyi lam gyis so/_/thabs kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na/_thabs dang thabs kyi sbyor bas so/_/shes rab ni mtshon byed de la ci zhig
[\[15a.4\]]rtogs she na/_khams gsum pa mtshon bya dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o/_/gang dang gang gi gnas gyur pas/_/de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur/_/dper na bud shing mer 'gyur ba bzhin du bskyed pa'i rim pa lha'i gar gyi 'khor los phung po dang khams dang skye mched sbyangs te/_
[\[15a.5\]]dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma mkhan po pham par byas pa bzhin no/_/de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sbyar na nyon mongs pa lnga'i gnyen por sangs rgyas lnga bsgom pa'am mi zab pa'i rdzogs rim la rtsa lnga'i rlung la bde ba bsgom pa 'am nyon mongs pa lnga po de nyid kho na stong pa nyid kyis
[\[15a.6\]]gseng brtol ba'o/_/de ltar re re'i sbyor ba bshad nas/_thun mong du sbyor ba/_rdo rje 'dzin bcas thams cad sbyong /_/zhes 'byung ste/_'od gsal bas thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa lnga ji ltar sbyong du rung zhe na/_
[\[15a.7\]]sems 'od gsal ba brten pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma nam mkha' la sprin sna tshogs byung nas de nyid du thim pa bzhin no/_/nang gi bye brag 'di lta bu gang gis shes she na/_bla ma'i man ngag la brten pa'o/_/de ltar rjes su mthun pa'i thabs gnyis bstan nas da ni brtag pa'i gleng gzhi
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bshad par bya ste/_'dzam bu'i gling ni gru gsum la btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes bya ste/_e yi cha byad bzang po yi/_/dbus su waM gyis rnam par brgyan/_/zhes so/_/gnas 'di'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i gleng gzhis ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bsgom bya ci mtshon zhe na/_btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga gru
[\[15b.2\]]gsum mtshon pa yin no/_/chags pa'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor b+ha ga zhes bya la/_grol ba'i lam dang sbyar na dkyil 'khor lus yin la/_rang lhag par gnas pa'i lam pa la dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings yin no/_/de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bde mchog dang sbyar na
[\[15b.3\]]lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo bcu drug dang a wa d+hU tI dang 'brel pa rlung rgyu ba dang /_g.yas pa ra sa nA dang 'brel pa bcu drug khrag rgyu ba dang /_g.yon pa la la nA dang 'brel pa bcu drug byang chub kyi sems rgyu ba dang /_dbus ma dang g.yas nas g.yon du 'brel pa sgo ma bzhi'i rtsa dang /_g.yas
[\[15b.4\]]g.yon 'brel pa mtshams ma bzhi'i rtsa dang /_'byung ba bzhi'i rlung dang /_bdud rtsi bzhi dang drug cu rtsa bzhi rten 'brel gyi gnas lugs yin la de'i dbus na gnas pa'i rlung la sems bzung nas phyi rol gyi rlung 'gags nas shes pa rtog med bskyed nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du
[\[15b.5\]]'gro ba yin no/_/de ltar gleng gzhi'i don gsum bshad nas de yang mos pa'i bye brag gis mu dra bzhi'i snang ba ni 'byung ba bzhi la mos pa la 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba 'am/_lha mo bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba 'am/_tshad med pa bzhir mos pa la tshad med pa bzhir snang
[\[15b.6\]]ba 'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am/_ye shes bzhir mos pa la de ltar du snang ba'am/_e waM ma yA yi ge bzhir mos pa la de ltar snang ba ste/_bdag byin gyis rlob par mos pa la glo bur gyi dri ma bsrabs pas stong pa mthong ba'i rgyu yin no zhes yan lag med
[\[15b.7\]]pa'i rdo rje 'dod do/_/yang na sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku dang mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes dpal mchog dang po las gsungs so/_/de ltar snang ba med pa'i bye brag bshad nas/_e waM gyi
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bye brag bshad par bya ste/_spyi bo dang lte ba ni e yin la/_mgrin pa dang snying ga waM yin te/_steng 'og gi bye brag gis thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/e waM gyi sgra de las sdud pa po'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar na mdo sde dang mthun pa'i yi ge'i don du bshad
[\[16a.2\]]par bya ste/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bstod do zhes bya ba'i bar du gleng gzhi dang tshig gi mtshams sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi bka' nyid du gnas pa yin pas bkar ba sgrub pa de la bshad pa'i rgyud kyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'am/_yang
[\[16a.3\]]na sprul pa'i skus 'dul ba'i ngor bde bar gshegs pas bshad la sdud pa pos gdul bya'i ngor sangs rgyas nyid du sdud pa por sprul pa'o/_/de gnyis kyi don bshad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gzhan gyi tshe/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas gsol ba btab nas bshad
[\[16a.4\]]pa'i rgyud gsungs kyang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no/_/de skad du yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/_sdud pa po nyid kyis gsungs pa yin la/_de'i don rtogs par dka' ba yang mdo sde gzhan du nga nyid 'chad pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i don
[\[16a.5\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_spyan ras gzigs kyis rtogs pa'i chags pa'i lam dus dang /_sa'i snying pos rtogs pa'i dus ngan pa dang /_'jam dpal gyis rtogs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so/_/de la bzang po ni b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bde ba'i rgyun 'jug pa'i dus so/_/ngan pa ni lus kyi
[\[16a.6\]]dkyil 'khor rlung me'i drod can gyi srog a wa d+hU tIr 'jug pa'i dus so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sgyu ma dang stong pa ro gcig pa'i dus te/_chags pa ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i dus yin la/_chags bral ni dga' bral yin la/_dbu ma ni lhan cig pa'i dga' ba yin te/_de
[\[16a.7\]]gsum mi dmigs pa ni bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba'o/_/chags pa dang chags bral 'dres pa ni kun rdzob tu tha dad pa yin yang /_don dam par ro gcig pa des na dngos dang dngos med ro gcig pa'i don ston pa ji lta bu zhe na/_yon tan drug dang ldan pa'am/_nyon mongs pa dang
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]shes bya'i sgrib pa bcom pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so/_/gnas gang zhe na/_sku dang gsung ni chos can yin la de yi chos nyid ni snying po yin no/_/de nyid sgrib pa gnyis kyis mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgras btsun mo zhes grags so/_/de'i b+ha
[\[16b.2\]]ga ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid do/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi b+ha ga la rnam par mi rtog par ro gcig pa na bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i/_tha snyad ji ltar rung zhe na/_lan du bka' stsal pa don dam par stong pa nyid dang ye shes ro gcig pa yin yang gdul bya'i skye bo mos
[\[16b.3\]]pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi yid 'phrog pa'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i gnas pad+ma dang zla ba dang gzhal yas khang dang /_ro'i gdan dang /_btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs pa yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs kyi rnam pa der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa la bdag gis thos so
[\[16b.4\]]zhes mtshams sbyor ro/_/de la ci'i phyir b+ha ga zhes bya zhe na/_nyon mongs pa dag_/shes rab stong pa nyid kyis 'joms pas na b+ha ga ste/_de nyid snang ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gdul bya rnams kyis stong pa nyid la gseng brtol ba'i phyir b+ha ga'i gzugs su sprul cing
[\[16b.5\]]bstan pa yin no/_/'di rjod par byed pa'i chos gang zhe na/_gleng gzhi'i don de nyid kyis rjod par byed pa ni e waM ma yA zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi yin la rjod byed des rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab kyi don ston pas na/_rgyud dgu'i chos kyi thog mar e waM ma yA bstan pa yin no/_/dgos pa ci'i
[\[16b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas dag pa'i dngos grub skyed/_/ces bya'o/_/mdo sde thams cad kyang e waM ma yA'i sgra brjod par bya ba yin na lan du lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brjod du med pa'i don/_nga yis sems can la bstan pa yin la/_yi ge des phyag rgya bzhi shes rab la thabs bzhugs so zhes
[\[16b.7\]]bya bar khong du chud pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ring du 'gro ba'o/_/sems de'i chos nyid rtogs pa ltar chos thams cad kyi chos nyid rtogs na ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_brgya lam zhig na/_thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas/_/nang gi bdag nyid g.yo med par/_/dul ba'i sems kyi mtshon
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]byed kyis/_/chos thams cad kyi mtshon bya mngon sum du byas nas tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'dzin pa thob bo/_/gang gis sems kyi stong nyid ma shes pa de srid kyi bar du bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med kyi lha'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi lam de las ma yin
[\[17a.2\]]no zhes spangs na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal ldan gang zhig gis mngon sum gyi lam dag pa'i sems kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i shes rab ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du thams cad kyi bsgoms na rang rig pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma dag pa'i mtshon bya rtogs nas khams gsum pa'i
[\[17a.3\]]chos nyid nam mkha' dang mnyam par gzigs pa chos kyi sku dang /_longs spyod dang /_sprul sku'i gzugs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bus sems can gyi don mdzad pa de yang mngon sum gyi rgyu rkyen dang bral na ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab par mtshon par mi nus so/_/rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'i
[\[17a.4\]]bshad pa'o//_//de ltar le'u dang pos zab pa'i rdzogs rim gyi shes bya bshad nas/_da ni nyams su blangs pa dbang bskur ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste/_thog mar dkyil 'khor dang bar du tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang tha mar dbang bskur ba'i don bshad par bya'o/_/de ltar sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/_dbang bskur ba'i
[\[17a.5\]]tshigs bcad gcig gis mdor bstan pa yin la/_de rgyas par bshad pa ni dang por bdag nyid lha'i dngos por byas la/_rdo rjes sa sbyang ba'i phyir yi ge hUM las rdo rje 'bar bar bya'o/_/de ltar sa sbyang ba dang bslang ba dang brtag pa bshad nas/_da ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bshad pa yin no/_/
[\[17a.6\]]tshon brtag pa ni 'byor pa'i dbang gis rin po che las byas pa'am/_'bring gis bsres pa'am/_tha mas 'bras kyi phye mas tshon rtsi bsgrub par bya'o/_/chung tshad gru gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_sor gsum gyi mtha' skor lhag pa ni tshon brtag pa'o/_/sgrub pa'i yan lag brtag pa ni
[\[17a.7\]]sngags kyi lam gyi bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyang ba byas nas dbang bskur ba thob pa'i rigs lnga'am/_yang na gar mkhan la sogs pa'i rigs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor der gzhug par bya'o/_/ji ltar sgrub pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa brtag pa ni mngon sum gyi lam mam/_sangs rgyas thams cad
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i pho brang na gnas pa bzhin du rnal 'byor pas zlos gar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi dbang phyug dang /_las kyi phyag rgya la sems gzung bar bya zhing longs spyod du
[\[17b.2\]]blangs na gdon mi za bar sems can rnams dam tshig nyams par gyur pa'i 'jigs pa thugs la bzhag nas/_byin rlabs kyi go 'phang dga' ba gsum dang /_sangs rgyas kyi don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin brgyad cu dang bral ba/_sngags pa'i lam yang sangs rgyas
[\[17b.3\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du rtogs pa yin no/_/de ltar dbang bskur ba'i gnas dang sa bshad nas/_da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshad par bya ste/_rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba dang /_rgyal ba nyid las skyes
[\[17b.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum du dbang nod pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar dgos pa bshad nas de'i rten slob dpon bshad pa ni/_zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la/_chags lam grol lam gyi tshogs 'khor dbul bar bya'o/_/rten slob dpon bshad nas/_sgrub pa'i
[\[17b.5\]]yan lag rnal 'byor ma bshad pa ni/_ma dang sring mo la sogs pa'i sngags skyes dbang thob pa'am/_de med na kun spyod ma la sogs pa'ang rung ste/_'di ni bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i rgyud du rnal 'byor 'khyil ma dang /_khu byug lta bur skad snyan pa dang /_rdo rje lta bur skad gsal ba rnams la/_
[\[17b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyis bstod pas de gzung bar bya'o/_/yang na zhing skyes kyi dbye ba ni bram ze mo la sogs pa rnam pa bdun te/_de la bzo byed pa'i rigs ngan smyig ma mkhan la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni smyig ma mkhan dang lham mkhan la sogs pa'o/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dam tshig bsrung ba dang /_
[\[17b.7\]]lha'i sku'i spyod lam bsgom pa las 'grub pa dang /_chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /_sngags kyi de kho na nyid shes pa dang /_dbyibs kyi de kho na nyid shes pas ni sgrub pa po'i sdig pa zad par byed pa dang /_btsan phyug ni ldang ba yang ba dang /_zo mdog bde ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]grub dang /_bsam gtan bzhi'i thun mong gi dngos grub dang /_mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i lo tshogs kyi rang bzhin gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/_/khyad par gyi mtshan nyid gang gis rtogs par
[\[18a.2\]]byed ce na/_du ba las ni mer shes shing /_/chu skyar las ni chu yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/_/rigs ni mtshan ma rnams kyis shes/_/zhes gsungs pas de gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyangs nas/_sngags dang rgyud dang de kho na nyid shes
[\[18a.3\]]pa'o/_/de la sngags ni bsgom bzlas so/_/rgyud ni sman no/_/de nyid ni ye shes lnga'o/_/gsang chen de ltar sbyangs nas zhes pa ni/_lus dang ngag gi bya bas sbyangs nas so/_/de skad du yang /_rtsa ba'i rgyud las/_gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su/_/rnal 'byor pas ni longs spyod bya/_/zhes gsungs
[\[18a.4\]]pa'o/_/mnyam sbyor las kyang /_de nas khrus bya dri zhim lus/_/ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan/_/sna tshogs gos ni thogs nas kyang /_/me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim/_/gang gis lha dang 'dra ba yi/_/bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs la/_/skal bzang dag ni phyag rgyas mtshan/_/tshogs kyi
[\[18a.5\]]'khor lo brtag par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'tshe ba thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni rnam par dben pa ste/_yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam/_/skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub/_/der ni dang por gdan bsham ste/_/'jam zhing reg na bder 'gyur ba/_/
[\[18a.6\]]sna tshogs pad+mo ras kyis g.yogs/_/de ni thams cad dag pa'i bdag_/ces gsungs so/_/g.yogs dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni bsku mnye dang gos rnam pa sna tshogs me dang gsos rnams byed pa la sogs pa'i grogs dang bcas pa'o/_/de skad du yang /_lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis/_/
[\[18a.7\]]sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang ma/_/a ra li yis kun 'grub 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' klas pa'i/_/lha mo kun dang bde mos pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas bkur sti bya zhing /_de ltar bsgrub pa'i slob
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dpon rig ma dang bcas la rnal 'byor ma gus pa'i sems kyis 'o ma dang zho mar la sogs pa dkar gsum dang /_'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra la sogs pa mngar gsum dang /_sha dang chang gi tshogs rnams dang /_/sha yi sbyor ba sha skam dang /_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo dbul bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[18b.2\]]de ltar tshogs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs nas/_da ni kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs ba/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid lngas me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang bya ba nan tan dang chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas bstod nas/_tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_de
[\[18b.3\]]la dang po ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so/_/de nyid bla med ye shes 'tshal/_/zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las mngon sum gyis stong pa nyid rtogs pa'o/_/rdo rje'i dbang bskur kun mkhyen gyis/_/zhes pa ni ro rdo rje ma las rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma bkrus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas
[\[18b.4\]]kun la gsang zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes par gsang ba'o/_/ji ltar dpal ldan sems des bya ba ni sngon bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje chos la dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag la bka' drin stsol cig ces pa'o/_/khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/_/zhes pa sems kyi stong pa
[\[18b.5\]]nyid rtogs pa'i mngon sum gyis lam spangs pa'o/_/'khor ba'i 'gro ba spangs pa'i phyir/_/zhes pa ni glo bur gyi rtog pa zad pa'i phyir/_dbang bzhi pa bdag la stsol cig ces pa'o/_/de ltar gsol ba btab nas/_da ni slob dpon snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_slob ma la tshogs kyi
[\[18b.6\]]dbus su bos nas snying rje bskyed la dbang bskur ba'o/_/de nas sgrub pa'i yan lag dang dbang bskur bar byed pa'i lus la mchod par byed pa ni/_rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor ldan/_/zhes pas ni bsnyen sgrub bzhis lhar bskyed pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing bla re bres pa ni gnas so/_/
[\[18b.7\]]'dod yon lnga yis brgyan byas zhes pa ni sngar tshogs 'khor du mchod pa'o/_/de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las/_de la gzugs sgra dri ro dang /_/reg bya bde bar myong ba yi/_/gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs/_/sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do/_/dri ni rab tu tshim byed de/_/ro ni ra sa ya na yin/_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]reg bya bde ba yin par bshad/_/rab tu reg pa dag pa'i bde/_/chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dri'i thig le dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/_/phreng dang shin tu dri zhim
[\[19a.2\]]sogs/_/zhes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim par bya ste kha so rtsis bkang la glu snyan pas mchod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa rmad byung mchog_/ces pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor mchod par bya'o/_/de ltar mchod pa byas nas/_phyag rgya dang mnyam par
[\[19a.3\]]sbyor ba las/_byang chub kyi sems rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas/_rnga yab dang /_gdugs la sogs pa'i gzugs dang /_glu dang dbyangs dang /_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra dang /_ga pur dang /_tsan+dan dang bcas pa'i dri dang /_
[\[19a.4\]]bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'o/_/bdud rtsi lnga'i dbang bskur ba'o/_/de yang slob dpon nam shes rab 'ba' zhig gi yin nam zhe na/_slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug dang /_phyag rgyar bcas zhes smos so/_/rin chen mchog gis dbang bskur ba/_/zhes bya ba ni ro rdo rje ma la sems
[\[19a.5\]]gzung ba'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ni dngos grub rnyed pas na rin chen mchog ces gsungs so/_/des 'gro ba'i gtso bo byang chub sems dpar dbang bskur ro/_/de yang mnyam sbyor las/_b+ha ga ling+ga e ma bde/_/thod pa pad+ma ling+ga yin/_/kha T+wAM ga ni ling+ga ste/_/sangs rgyas phyag
[\[19a.6\]]rgya pad+mor bshad/_/bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin/_/rnam pa kun mkhyen shes bya'i phyir/_/dbang bskur thams cad dbang bskur che/_/zhes pa dang /_lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/_/srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtse/_/zhim pa'i btung ba nyid myangs na/_/rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob/_/
[\[19a.7\]]ces gsungs so/_/de nas rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i/_/mtshan nyid dag pa nyams dga' sbyin/_/zhes bya ba ni slob ma la bshad pa'i dbang du byas nas/_bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la bde ba rtog pa med pa bskyed nas/_dbang bskur ba 'am/_tshogs kyi dbang du byas na/_ngas ji ltar dbang bskur ba
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bzhin du khyed kyang bdud rtsi lnga'i ro la longs spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/khrag chen po ni rang byung gi me tog go/_/ga bur bcas ni byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o/_/tsan+dan dmar ni rta mchog go/_/rdo rje chu ni mi bskyod pa'o/_/lnga pa rnam snang ni sems me long lta bu las byung bar
[\[19b.2\]]bshad pas de'i shugs kyis lhag ma bzhi'i ye shes las byung ba'o/_/rgyu de'i phyir ye shes lnga dang /_'bras bu bdud rtsi lngar snang ba ni/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthun par gsungs/_/zhes bya'o/_/dam tshig 'di ni bla na med/_/ces bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du bskyed
[\[19b.3\]]pa'i dam tshig go/_/bzang po khyod kyis bskyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba byin pa ste/_zhi ba'i btung ba gtsang sbra ston pa'o/_/de ltar gnas bshad nas/_dam tshig ni srog chags gnod par mi bya ste/_lce'i rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu rtog pa med pa la gnod par mi bya'o/_/dam tshig 'di
[\[19b.4\]]ni bla na med/_/ces pa ni ro rdo rje ma'i stong pa nyid mi 'dor ba'o/_/de dag gi don 'di skad ston pa yin te/_rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyis/_gtum mo'i drod kyis phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa la byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas thod pa'i nang du
[\[19b.5\]]bzhag la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas pas srin lag dang /_mthe bos ro rdo rje ma myong zhing /_klang rgyas kyis go ro tsa na 'dzag pa'i man ngag dbang bskur bar bya ba ni/_rin chen mchog gi dbang bskur gyi/_/'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya/_/zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/de'i
[\[19b.6\]]rjes la khyod kyis kyang zhim pa'i btung ba'i rjes su gnang ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab mi 'dor ba'i dam tshig sbyin par bya'o/_/khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin na sngar bshad pa'i rig ma sngags las skyes ma dang /_ye shes las skyes ma dang /_las las skyes ma rigs dang mthun
[\[19b.7\]]pa'am rang gi rigs las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba mthun pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de ltar grol ba'i lam dang chags pa'i lam thun mong gi dbang bskur ba bstan nas/_sngon du gsungs
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]pa'i rig ma zhes bya ba ni sngags skyes dang /_zhing skyes dang /_las skyes dang ye shes las skyes pa rnams so/_/yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba'o/_/sih+la ga pur gyis bsgos nas zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi gnas su dri'i thig le byas
[\[20a.2\]]la me tog bkod cing cod pan dang rgyan btags nas sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa'i lha mor sprul par bya'o/_/yang na rig ma ni de'i sprul pa bya ste zhes bya ba ni bsnyen sgrub bzhi yis sbyangs nas rig ma de'i dri ma med par byas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/phyag rgya dang thabs kyi gdong dgab
[\[20a.3\]]pa ni ngo tsha'i 'jigs pa dang bcas na rtog med kyi ye shes mi skye bas na gdong g.yogs par bya'o/_/bag tsha ba med na g.yogs par mi bya'o/_/ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/_/de srid bar du bsten par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'khor lo bzhi byang chub kyi sems kyis bkang nas/_gsang ba'i rdo rje nor bu'i
[\[20a.4\]]mtshams su byang chub kyi sems gzung la slob ma'i lce la gzhag par bya'o/_/de skad du yang gdan bzhi las/_ro dang lce yi rnam shes rtag spangs nas/_/bde mchog 'gyur ba mngon du khyim gyi gnas/_/su ni dbus su gnas pa gzung bar bya/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_mnyam sbyor las kyang /_bde ba phyag rgya
[\[20a.5\]]la bab nas/_/bud med dag kyang bsgoms nas ni/_/rdo rje nor bu'i mtshams bzung nas/_/slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad nas/_da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste/_de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro/_/zhes bya ba ni snga ma
[\[20a.6\]]bzhin du bsnyen sgrub bzhis sbyongs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya slob ma la byin nas a wa d+hU tI kha sbyar la bde bar rnal 'byor ma'i stobs kyis bskyed pa la slob dpon gyis dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba lus bde ba dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yid bde ba rtog pa med pa slob ma'i spyod yul dag
[\[20a.7\]]tu bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin spangs shing /_/zhes bya ba ni bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa nub pa'o/_/rang rig pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni/_bde ba mi rtog pa mngon sum gyis shes pa'o/_/dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog_/ces pa ni reg bya'i
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]dngos po dang reg bya'i stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i mchog ste/_yul gyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa rnam snang gis rgyas btab pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/_/de nyid rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa dang bral bas na rdul bral lo/_/'dod chags chags bral 'dres pa ste/_/zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[20b.2\]]'dod chags dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang /_chags bral dga' ba dang dga' bral te/_de gnyis stong pa nyid du ro gcig pas na 'dres pa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres/_/zhes pa ni lus shes pa'i shes pa sgyu ma lta bu dang reg bya stong pa nyid du 'dres pa'o/_/de nyid srog chags
[\[20b.3\]]rnams kyi srog_/ces pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i lhan cig skyes dga'o/_/de nyid mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyis mi gnod pa'o/_/dam pa ste zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang ldan pa'i stong pa'o/_/de nyid kyis ni thams cad mkhyen/_/zhes pa ni reg bya'i stong pa nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes
[\[20b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dang dpal he ru ka'i ye shes ni ming gi rnam grangs so/_/'di dang de dang gzhan yang rung /_/zhes pa ni rjes las byung ba'i bde ba stong pa shes pa'i rgyun no/_/dngos po ni snang ba'i dngos po'o/_/dngos med ni mi snang ba'o/_/'di las byung zhes shes rab ye shes kyi
[\[20b.5\]]stong nyid shes pa las 'di dag thams cad byung ba'o/_/de skad du yang mkha' 'gro las/_klung ni dbang bar gyur pa las/_/nya dag myur du 'phar ba ltar/_/de bzhin stong gsal rang bzhin las/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dang po gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas/_gnyis
[\[20b.6\]]pa slob ma la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de yang mnyam sbyor las/_slob dpon ji ltar zlos gang las/_/slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin/_/slob ma dag dang deng phyin cad/_/phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes gzung nas/_/rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la
[\[20b.7\]]bsgrubs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de yang chags pa'i lam shes pa'i rig pa skye ba'i dbang du byas nas dpa' bo lus bde ba ni dga' ba yin la lus ni dga' ba 'phel nas/_rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag par snang ba ni mchog dga' yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtog
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]pa med pa'i yul ma lus pa bde bar 'gyur ba ni lhan cig skyes dga' yid bde ba yin no/_/bde ba'i thabs kyi ma lus nyid/_/ces bya ba ni/_de'i tshe tshor ba sdug bsngal dang /_btang snyoms dang bral bas/_yul chos ci snang ba thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du ma lus par
[\[21a.2\]]rig par bya'o/_/grol ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas nas spyi gtsug tu phyin pa ni dga' ba yin la/_lkog mar phyin pa ni mchog dga' yin la/_snying gar phyin pa ni khyad par gyi dga' ba yin la/_bzhi pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yin no/_/de ltar dga' ba bzhi'i rim pa bshad nas/_dbang bzhi'i go
[\[21a.3\]]rims bshad par bya ste/_nub dang po rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /_nub gnyis pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /_nub gsum pa b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /_nub bzhi pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur
[\[21a.4\]]ba bzhi pa bya ste/_ji ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dus su/_yul gyi stong pa de bzhin du/_sems kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i dbang bzhi pa'o/_/de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las/_lha yi bde ba chen po kun/_/thabs dang rnal 'byor bde bas myong /_/sems kyi bde ba thams cad kyi/_/dbang bskur bde ba las byung
[\[21a.5\]]ba'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems kyis bkrus nas su/_/zhes pa ni/_dbang bzhi pa'i rim pa kun rdzob dang /_don dam byang chub kyi sems so/_/slob ma'i sdig dang bral byas te/_/zhes pa ni chu'i dbang bskur bas lus kyi sgrib pa 'dag pa dang /_gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas ngag gi sgrib pa
[\[21a.6\]]'dag pa dang /_shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur bas/_sems kyi gzung ba'i dri ma 'dag pa dang /_dbang bzhi pas sems kyi 'dzin pa'i dri ma 'dag pa'o/_/de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas grong mchog spyan snga ru/_/zhes pa smos te/_
[\[21a.7\]]dkyil 'khor bzhi las/_b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan snga ru'o/_/de la rjes su gnang ba'i tshig ni byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa bzhed nas/_da ni sems can don rab kyi/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar gnang ba byin nas/_dbang bskur ba dang gnang ba nod pa'i rjes thogs la/_'jam pa'i
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]tshig gis dbugs dbyung ba brjod par bya ste/_de ring gson pa 'bras bur bcas/_/zhes bya ba nas/_rdzogs pa nyid du bdag gyur to/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas yon dbul ba bshad par bya ste/_rab tu mgu bas mig gdangs te/_/zhes bya ba nas/_de dang de ni nges par dbul/_/
[\[21b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mdor bstan nas/_rgyas par bshad pa ni/_bla ma thugs rje bdag gis kyang /_/zhes pa ni slob ma la phan par bzhed pa'i sems so/_/'dzin pa med pa yis ni rang gi mngon sum gyi lam nyams su myong nas slob ma'i zhan pa sbyang ba'i phyir mngon sum gyi lam ston pa yin te dbul
[\[21b.3\]]ba'i lam yin no/_/de nas de la tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod cing /_gser ni stong phrag brgyar gnas kyang /_/zhes bya ba nas/_khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags kyis/_/zhes bya bas ni rab tu yon dbul ba ston to/_/mngon par 'dod pa rnyed nas su/_/'di ltar yang yang mkhyen par gsol/_/zhes pa ni
[\[21b.4\]]bdag gi lus dbul ba mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed kyi bar du rim gyis brjod par mdzod cig ces pa'o/_/dbul ba'i dgos pa ni/_di ring sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/_/ces bya ba nas/_de nyid du ni gzhag par bya/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis bdag gis mngon sum gyis lam mthong nas gzhan la
[\[21b.5\]]yang bstan par bya'o zhes slob mas tshig tu brjod pa'i sgo nas dam 'char gzhug go/_/las kyi phyag rgya 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ram zhe na/_slob ma'i mos pa shes byas te/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang /_dam tshig gi phyag rgya rlung me'i
[\[21b.6\]]drod can las/_dga' ba bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin rim gyis bskyed par bya'o/_/de yang ji ltar bya zhe na/_dbang bskur cho ga bzhin byin nas/_/zab cing rgya che la mos na/_/zhes bya ba ni reg bya rdo rje ma las dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bzhin du bde ba stong pa nyid zab pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i rnam pa gsum rgya che ba'i rang
[\[21b.7\]]bzhin rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid la mos pa slob dpon gyis mngon sum gyi gzhan don gyi tshig gis nyams su myong ba bde ba stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/kha cig tshig dbang rin po che/_/zhes 'dod kyang /_de ni rigs pa ma yin te/_dbang bskur ba nyams su
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]myong ba'i don gtan la phab pa yin pas/_de yang mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin no/_/dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob nas su/_/zhes bya ba ni phan yon 'bras bu rtogs pa yin te/_mchog ni rtogs pa'o/_/ma lus ni dbang gsum thob nas so/_/rnyed dka' ni rjes su dpag
[\[22a.2\]]dka'i lam gyis mi rtogs pa'o/_/mtshungs med ni yul gyi stong pa nyid do/_/rdo rje brdungs byas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du rtogs pa'o/_/dpal gyis zin cing zhes bya ba ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/longs spyod zhing du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur zhing /_/
[\[22a.3\]]zhes bya ba ni gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes so/_/gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni rjes gnang thob pa'o/_/'jig rten sdig gi dgra las rgyal/_/zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o/_/blo ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go/_/go bgos rgyal bar
[\[22a.4\]]'gyur zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku thob pa'o/_/byang chub la dmigs sems ni rab rgyas gsal/_/zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thob pa'o/_/dri med rnams la 'byor pa ni/_/'dir rgyu zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku 'thob pa'o/_/le'u gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po'i 'grel pa'o//_//de ltar shes rab
[\[22a.5\]]ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan nas/_da ni dbang bzhi pa bshad par bya ste/_gzhan don la zhugs brtson 'grus can/_/zhes bya ba ni slob dpon sems kyi stong par 'dod do/_/sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir ni slob ma bzhi pa thob par 'dod pa'o/_/shes rab thabs kyi don bsgom pa/_/zhes pa ni shes rab ni chos kyi
[\[22a.6\]]dbyings so/_/thabs ni stong pa nyid bsgom pa rang rig pa'i mngon sum mo/_/bsgom ni mngon sum du grub pa'o/_/de ltar mdor bstan nas/_da ni de'i rgyas par bshad par bya ste/_gang zhig bsgom pas 'khor ba yi/_/rgal dka'i rgya mtshor mi gnas shing /_/rnal 'byor pa ni rang don tsam/_/bsgoms pas mya ngan
[\[22a.7\]]las 'das la/_/zhes pa ni nyan thos gang zhig gang zag gi bdag med pa bsgom pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi gnas shing /_theg pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/rang gi don tsam bsgoms pas/_phung po lhag med kyi mya ngan las 'das pa thob po/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]shes rab kyis srid pa la mi gnas shing /_snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te/_/de ji lta bu zhe na/_gang zhig rab kyi mthar thug pas/_/dri med sangs rgyas snod du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ste/_sa bcu gcig pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dri ma dang bral ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i stong pa ro gcig
[\[22b.2\]]pa'i rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o/_/ci'i phyir rmad du byung zhe na/_gnyen po 'phel ba dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro/_/'o na sangs rgyas su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ngor bla med byang chub skye zhes bya'o/_/de ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
[\[22b.3\]]'das par gnas pa dang 'phel 'grib dang bral bar bstan cing /_gnyen po dang /_spang bya dang bral bar bstan nas/_phung po lnga la sogs chos dang /_/theg pa gsum po dor mi bya/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_ma dag pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa dor bar mi bya zhing /_de'i gnyen po theg pa gsum po yang dor
[\[22b.4\]]bar mi bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos dbyings mnyam pa zhes bya ba smos te/_mnyam pa gnyen po dag pa dang /_mi mnyam pa phung po la sogs pa dag pa'o/_/de gnyis ka yang chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_chu shing lta bu zhes bya ba smos te/_dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis ka med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[22b.5\]]gang la ji ltar gzung bar bya zhe na/_rang gi sems la de ltar gzung bar bya'o/_/de ltar spang bya dang gnyen po mnyam par bstan nas/_da ni stong pa dang mi stong pa mnyam par bstan pa'i phyir stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig tu yang mi bsgom mo/_/mi stong pa'i dngos po 'ba' zhig tu yang mi bsgom la/_de ni blang ba dang
[\[22b.6\]]dor ba mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni stong pa nyid spang bar mi bya ste zhes pa chos can med pas chos nyid 'ba' zhig dor bar yang mi bya'o/_/mi stong pa dor ram zhe na/_dngos po'i chos mi stong ba yang dor ro/_/stong pa dang mi stong ba blang ba dang dor bar gzung ba las nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na/_tha mal min
[\[22b.7\]]pa'i rnam rtog skyes/_/zhes bya ba gsungs te/_rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rnam rtog du ma skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbu ma rab tu mi gnas pa bzhin du de gnyis ka btang na nyes pa ci yod ce na/_btang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/_des na de gnyis spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_blang ba dang
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]dor ba gnyis spang bar bya'o/_/de'i 'bras bu ci yin zhe na/_'dzin pa gnyis ni yongs btang ba/_/rnam par dag cing grol ba'i gnas/_/zhes bya ba ste/_sgrib pa gnyis rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi grol ba'i gnas so/_/de ni dag pa dang ma dag
[\[23a.2\]]pa'i mtha' las grol bar bstan pa ni/_bdag ces bya ba rtog pa ste/_/des na de yang gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_bdag dag go bdag ma dag go zhes gtang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'gyur ba med ces bya ba smos te/_chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma dang bcas pa dang /_dri ma dang bral
[\[23a.3\]]ba med pas na 'gyur ba med cing rang nyid la dri mas gos pa'i dogs pa yang med do/_/rgyu des na/_dag pa'i gnas la 'dun pa med/_/ces bya ba smos te/_ma dag pa med pas na dag pa la 'dod pa mi skye'o/_/da ni thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' dang bral ba ston te/_dang po ni 'khor ba'i thog
[\[23a.4\]]ma'o/_/tha ma ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/mtha' de gnyis nam mkha' dang bral ba grol ba nam mkha' lta bu rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o/_/da ni yod pa dang med pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i snying rje can gyis sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste/_
[\[23a.5\]]sgyu ma'i skyes bu ji bzhin du sems can yang yod ce 'am/_med ces sgro btags pa dang dbang bskur ba'i gdams ngag sbyin par bya ste/_sgyu ma dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar spros pa bzhi 'am bcu drug dang bral bas na sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin la shes rab ces grags so/_/
[\[23a.6\]]de ltar shes rab kyi rang bzhin bshad nas/_da ni thabs kyi rang bzhin bshad par bya ste/_yid bzhin nor ltar sems can don/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sems rang rig pa 'od gsal ba la sems can ci ltar mos pa ltar snang bas na sems can don no/_/ma lus byed pa'i snying rje che/_/zhes bya
[\[23a.7\]]ba ni snod dang bcud ma lus pa sems 'od gsal ba'i snang ba yin pas na ma lus byed ces bya'o/_/de nyid sgyu ma sdug bsngal dang bral bas na snying rje'o/_/de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pas na dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na/_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dmigs pa med pa'i gnas zhes grags/_/zhes bya'o/_/de ltar thabs kyi rang bzhin bstan nas/_da ni zung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste/_de ltar yang bsgom pa gsum las sgom pa dang po ni mtshan nyid lnga dang ldan pa yin te/_zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_mngon sum gyi lam gyi
[\[23b.2\]]mtshan nyid dang /_yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /_glo bur gyi mtshan nyid dang /_glo bur dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de la zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni blo dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te/_blo dang rig pa dang shes rab rig pa gnyis ro gcig pa'o/_/dpe ji lta bu zhe na/_ji ltar
[\[23b.3\]]mkha' dang mkha' nyid bzhin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_nam mkha' dang mkha' nyid las khyad par gzhan spangs pa dang ma spangs pa las ma gtogs pa dngos po la skra'i rtsa mo'i tshad tsam yang med do/_/dbye ba med na ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_sgom pa po yang rang rig pa yin la/_bsgom par bya ba yang
[\[23b.4\]]rang rig pa yin zhing /_bsgom pa yang rang rig pa'i chos nyid yin pas/_lta ba po lta sbyin dang /_lta ba mig lta bar bya ba'i gzugs lta bu ni med de/_de bas na tha mi dad pa'i shes pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i bsgom pa zhes brjod do/_/da ni bya ba dang byed pa zung du 'jug pa ston te/_nyan thos kyi bya ba dang
[\[23b.5\]]byed pa po dang /_mu stegs kyi bza' bar bya ba dang za ba po las grol ba ni don dam par rnam par bsgom par bya'o/_/da ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed med pa ston te/_gcig dang du ma med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis sgrub par byed pa dang /_bsgrub par bya ba cung zad kyang med de rang rig pa'i phyir ro/_/da ni blang
[\[23b.6\]]dor med pa ston te/_blang dor med pas spang bar bya ba dang /_rang rig yin pas blang bar bya ba med do/_/de yang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na/_bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs kyis shes te rang gi sems yin la byin gyis rlob pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par skye ba'o/_/de yang gang gis she na/_mngon
[\[23b.7\]]sum gyis mthong ste/_gzugs la dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sgra la sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_dri la sgyu ma lta bu dang /_ro la mig yor gyi grong khyer lta bu ste/_mig yor de la seng ge zla ba'i grong khyer zhes grag go/_/reg bya ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_gzugs kyis stong pa nas reg bya'i bar du yul gyis stong pa ni
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dbang po'i mngon sum gyis shes te/_shes pa thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis shes so/_/de ltar na 'gro ba thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ma gtogs pa rnam par gnas pa cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med do/_/da ltar zung du 'jug pa'i
[\[24a.2\]]mtshan nyid bshad nas/_da ni mngon sum du lam gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa las/_/skyes pa'i rang bzhin ji bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba'i lus kyi bde ba mngon sum du skyes par gyur pa la rtsod pa med pa de bzhin du rang rig pa'i chos kyi
[\[24a.3\]]dbyings kyi b+ha gar rtog pa med pa'i shes pa gzhan las skyes pa'i ye shes ni dbang bzhi pa yin no/_/cung zad skyes pa'i ye shes zhes ci'i phyir brjod ce na/_chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa ma yin gyi/_rang gi sems kyi chos nyid stong pa cung zad tsam zhes bya'o/_/glo bur gyi dri ma dang
[\[24a.4\]]bral na ji ltar rang gi sems nyid mthong zhe na/_thog ma ni dga' dang mchog dga'o/_/dbus ni lhan cig skyes pa ste/_/de rnams las 'das pa'i 'od gsal ba ni rnam par dag pa ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/_/zhes bya'o/_/mngon sum yin na ji ltar dran pa yin zhe na/_rang gis rig
[\[24a.5\]]pa'i ye shes te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa dang khyad par med par dran pa zhes ming du btags so/_/tshu rol mthong ba ni tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas na brjod par nus pa ma yin pa'o/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams las skyes pa'i shes pa ni ji ltar 'od gsal bar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[24a.6\]]gzugs la lta ba dang /_sgra la nyan pa dang /_reg bya la reg pa'i khyad par dang /_lus kyi g.yo 'gul gyis dge ba dang mi dge ba byed pa dang /_ngag gi sgo nas smra ba dang /_dgod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba brjod pa dang /_lus kyi sgo nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las thams cad byed
[\[24a.7\]]pa la/_bde ba chen po'i sems ma gtogs pa gzhan rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i glo bur gyi sems kyis mi bya'o/_/snod dang bcud thams cad bde ba chen pos rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ba yin gyi/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gzung bar mi bya'o/_/de ji ltar bsgom par
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]'gyur zhe na/_de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rgyun du mos pa'i rnal 'byor skye/_/zhes smos te/_rang rig pas stong pa nyid mthong ba'i mngon sum la/_bar du rnam par rtog pa'i bgegs med par byas nas rgyun bsring ba'i sgom pa'o/_/de skad du yang don dam snying po las kyang /_
[\[24b.2\]]mngon sum shes pa rgyun bsrings pa/_/sgom pa zhes su de la bshad/_/ces 'byung ba dang /_gdan bzhi las kyang /_dngos po ngo bo med pa yis/_/sgom pa dag ni mtshon bya ba/_/gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/_/sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste/_/sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis/_/
[\[24b.3\]]dngos med rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de'i mngon sum grangs ji lta bu zhe na/_gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_rdo rje dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[24b.4\]]mngon sum bsgom pa'i man ngag gang zhe na/_mnyam pa'i sems byed ces bya ba smos te/_nges pa'i shes pa mngon sum gyis zlos gar byed pa ni a sa ma sa ma zhes bya ba ste/_dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag yin no/_/de ltar mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas/_da ni yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya
[\[24b.5\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgom pa mchog_/ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsgom pa'i chos kyi dbyings mngon sum gyi mchog go/_/ji ltar mchog yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/_/sogs pa'i sgras tshangs pa dang /_brgya
[\[24b.6\]]byin la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/brtan pa snod dang g.yo ba bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sems kyi stong nyid de shes pa'o/_/de bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na/_dngos dang dngos med bral ba yin/_/zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gcig gis las myur ba bstan to/_/dngos po dang dngos
[\[24b.7\]]med ni sgyu ma dang stong pa'o/_/de ro gcig pa ni de las grol ba'o/_/myur ba las byung ba gang yin zhe na/_kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nas/_/zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad phyed kyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ston la/_tshigs bcad phyed 'og mas ye shes phun sum tshogs pa skye ba ston
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]to/_/de ltar yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas/_glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/_rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ni/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_ma rig pa'i 'khrul ba bag chags so/_/ye shes glog ni zil gyis mnan/_/zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i 'khrul pa'i nang du
[\[25a.2\]]res 'ga' sgyu ma dang gzugs brnyan lta bu shes pa glog lta bu skye yang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rmongs pa zil gyis mnan nas/_stong pa nyid la sems 'dren mi nus so/_/stong pa nyid de la nges par ma skyes pas na khams gsum 'khor ba yin te/_ma rig pa'i khams gsum 'khor ba
[\[25a.3\]]zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro/_/des na 'dod chags la sogs pas bsgos pa'i sems 'di ni spang bar dka' bas na/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis 'khor ba yin par gsungs so/_/glo bur gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas/_dri ma dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_chags pa la sogs
[\[25a.4\]]pa'i dri ma mngon sum gyi lam gyis bcom nas rang bzhin brgyad cu'i rtog pa las grol ba'o/_/'od gsal ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can mchog 'di ni rgyu dbang bzhi pa 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar zung du 'jug pa bshad
[\[25a.5\]]nas/_de'i mjug bsdu ba ni/_des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_'di las gzhan pa'i lam thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pas/_des bde ba'i lam du 'gyur ba ni med do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi bde ba mtha' yas pa thams cad don du gnyer ba rnams zhi gnas kyi bde ba mngon
[\[25a.6\]]sum du byed cing lhag mthong gi bde ba mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu ni 'di las thabs gzhan ci yang med do zhes bya'o/_/de ltar zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bshad nas/_da ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i zung 'jug bstan te/_de la sbyor ba gdams ngag gi mtshan nyid
[\[25a.7\]]bstan pa ni/_sdug bsngal ma lus pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thob par 'dod pas sems kyi rang bzhin yod pa dang med pa brtags nas chu'i zla ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/ji srid du rnam par rtog pa'i ling tog pa'i kun 'byung ba dang
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bcas pa de srid du 'bras bu sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dang ldan par 'gyur la/_nam zhig sems kyi stong nyid shes nas rnam par rtog pa spangs pa de'i tshe 'phags pa rnams dgyes pa'i bde ba rtog pa med pa skye zhing /_rtog pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa zad par byas nas rang nyid kyi
[\[25b.2\]]sems kyi stong nyid mthong nas chos thams cad kyi stong nyid kyang rgyas shing gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad du yang gdan bzhi las/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/mtshon bya thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar sbyor ba gdams ngag gi
[\[25b.3\]]mtshan nyid bstan nas/_da ni dngos gzhi bsgom pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pa/_/rnal 'byor nyes pa byas nas su/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_phyag rgya chen po las/_stong nyid nges par byas nas bsgom par bya'o/_/de yang thabs gang gis she na/_
[\[25b.4\]]rjes su rang gi dam tshig nyams pa bskang bar bya zhes smos te/_dam tshig bsrungs pa'i stengs su bla mas man ngag rjes su gnang nas bsgom par bya'o/_/de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las/_gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po/_/rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag_/chos log sogs pa
[\[25b.5\]]spang bya zhing /_/yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang rig_/mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni/_/bla ma'i lam gyis thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/thabs kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas/_bcos pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_thun mong dngos grub skye ba yi/_/zhes bya ba nas/_tshigs bcad gcig gis
[\[25b.6\]]bcos ma'i bsgom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang sngags dang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa yin no/_/de skad du slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_ji ga glang po rnyed gyur nas/_/glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed dam/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'o na gang gis mtshon zhe na/_rang 'dod lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas nyid
[\[25b.7\]]kyis mthar thug pa'i/_/mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid dngos byas nas/_/zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rang 'dod pa'i lhar bsgoms nas/_rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang 'dod pa'i lha phyag rgya la mngon sum gyis mtshon par byas nas/_sangs rgyas nyid kyis mthar thug pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs shing khams gsum po nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de gang gis bsgoms pas she na/_mkhas mchog nyid la dmigs pa'o/_/rang rig pa mngon sum gyis nyin dang mtshan du goms par byas pas so/_/de ltar bcos
[\[26a.2\]]ma dang bral ba'i sgom pa'i mtshan nyid bshad nas/_da ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_ri rtse dang ni zhi byed gnas/_/zhes bya ba nas/_sngags shes pas ni gnas bcos te/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas/_des ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na/_bde dang ldan pas bsgom
[\[26a.3\]]par bya/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_zag bcas kyi bde ba dga' ba dang mchog dga' la sogs pa dang ldan pas bsgom par bya'o/_/bde ba stong pa de'i thabs gang zhe na/_shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi la stong pa nyid ma bsgoms
[\[26a.4\]]par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gnas dang ldan pa'i sgom pa bshad nas/_da ni mjug bsdu ba ston pa/_/de bas de ltar rdzogs byang chub/_/ces bya ba smos te/_'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang bzhin phyag rgya bzhi spangs shing de dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mngon
[\[26a.5\]]sum gyi lam med na stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig gam rang rig pa 'ba' zhig gis dngos grub mi 'thob bo/_/de ltar rim gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs bshad nas/_da ni zung du 'jug pa'i thabs gsum pa bshad par bya ste/_'di las ye shes skyes pas na/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[26a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni zla ba tshes pa bzhin du zhi gnas kyi bde ba la lhag mthong gi bde ba skye ba ni yul phyag rgya bzhi la rag las pa yin no/_/de ltar tshigs bcad phyed kyis mdor bstan nas/_da ni phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad par bya ste/_gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste/_/zhes bya ba ni
[\[26a.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_bram ze'i rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas spyan du bskyed nas snyoms par zhugs pa las/_dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid las/_bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste me long lta bu'i stong
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]pa nyid bsgom pa'o/_/zhe sdang rtag tu phyag rgya che/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rdo rje'i rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gis rgyal rigs kyi bu mo mA ma kI'i rigs su bskyed nas/_lhan cig skyes dga'i mthar stong pa'i rgyas btab pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid do/_/phrag dog
[\[26b.2\]]las kyi phyag rgya ste/_/zhes bya ba ni las kyi rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gi dmangs rigs kyi bu mo sgrol mar bskyed nas lhan cig skyes dga' bskyed pa'i mthar bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab pa ni las kyi phyag rgya ste bya ba nan tan gyi chos nyid do/_/'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_/zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i
[\[26b.3\]]rigs la mos pa'i gang zag gis rje'u rigs kyi bu mo gos dkar mor bskyed la dga' ba gsum gyi mthar bde ba chen po'i rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid do/_/de skad du mtshan brjod las/_mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/_/sems can thams
[\[26b.4\]]cad dga' bar byed/_/ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so/_/phyag rgya de dag rnal 'byor pas/_/rdzogs par byed pas bstan par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas mngon sum du skyed par byed pa bde ba chen po rdzogs par byed pas/_phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyu'i tshogs pa bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rigs
[\[26b.5\]]dang gnyis ka mngon sum du/_/lha yi gzugs su bsam par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni bsnyen bsgrub bzhis sbyangs nas lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa ni dang ba'i dad pa bskyed nas bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro/_/rmongs pas zhi 'gyur khro bas drag_/ces bya ba ni gti mug gi stong pa nyid bsgoms pas
[\[26b.6\]]zhi bar 'gyur te/_zhe sdang gi chos nyid bsgoms pas dag pa dang /_'dod chags kyi chos nyid bsgoms pas chags pa chen po dang /_phrag dog gi chos nyid bsgoms pas sems can gyi don rab tu byed pas na rgyal ba lnga'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de skad du yang /_sems gang gis na 'ching 'gyur
[\[26b.7\]]ba/_/sems de nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/yul phyag rgya bshad nas da ni dus bshad par bya ste/_tho rangs ni 'od gsal ba'o/_/nyi ma phyed ni snang ba mched pa'o/_/mtshan mo ni snang ba ste/_dga' ba gsum 'od gsal ba ni 'od gsal ba dang bcas pa'i ye shes ni phyag rgya'i sbyor
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bas rtogs par bya'o/_/de ltar dus bshad nas bslab par bya ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/_skye bo mi srun pa rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor lta bu 'am/_mu stegs can lta bu bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pas/_rang gi sems nyid snang ba'i phyag rgya'i lha mo la mos par
[\[27a.2\]]bya'o/_/de lta bu'i bag tsha ba med pa'i rnam par dben pa'i gnas yin na phyag rgya bzhi mngon sum du bstan par bya'o/_/gal te mngon sum shes rab ma rnyed na/_/byol song ma la goms par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni/_byol song gi sgra ni logs na gnas pa la bya ste/_rang gi phyag rgya ma yin pa'i ngan spyod
[\[27a.3\]]ma la yang de goms par bya'o/_/de skad du yang mnyam sbyor las/_rnyed dang ma rnyed bde kun gyi/_/ngan spyod ma la 'ang 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/ye shes pa na re byol song gi sgras ni/_'khyog por 'gro ba yin pas/_lte ba'i mtheb tshad gang gi gtum mo drod rlung 'khyil ba
[\[27a.4\]]'khyog par 'gro bas na byol song ma zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de ltar mngon sum gyi lam phyag rgya bzhi nyin re 'am zla ba 'am lor mngon sum gyi yul du ma byas na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ldang ba'i thabs ji lta bu zhe na/_dam nyams bag med gang 'gyur na/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_dbang
[\[27a.5\]]bskur zhing slar yang mngon sum gyi lam dor bar mi byed cing sdom pa gzung bar bya'o/_/de ltar zung 'jug gi mtshan nyid bshad nas mjug bsdu ba ni/_des na ma lus sdom ldan zhing /_/rdzas dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_sdom ldan ni rten gyi gang zag go/_/rdzas ni sman no/_/
[\[27a.6\]]sngags ni sgom bzlas so/_/sbyor ba ni 'khrul 'khor te/_byang chub kyi sems dga' bral du mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o/_/de ltar zung du 'jug pa gsum po bstan pa la khyad par ci yod ce na/_dang po ni bdag byin rlob pa'i thabs kyis skar khung nas nam mkha' mthong ba bzhin du yul
[\[27a.7\]]dang yul can gyis stong nyid cig car du mthong ba yin no/_/gnyis pa ni seng ge phrug pa bzhin du gzung ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab cing 'dzin pa la mi bskyod pa'i rgyas btab nas/_sems kyi stong nyid shes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas btab nas rim gyis bsgom pa yin
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]no/_/gsum pa ni yul las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas/_zla ba tshes pa ltar zag bcas la brten pa'i bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa yin no/_/de ltar rgyud dgu'i thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor la blo dang ldan pas dus rtag tu gnas par byas nas/_srid
[\[27b.2\]]pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gcig pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang bsgom mo/_/ci'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya zhe na/_don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig_/bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la/_/zhes bshad pas/_mngon sum don gyi rnam par skyes/_/rgyas 'debs zhes ni bshad
[\[27b.3\]]pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/brtag pa gnyis pa'i rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o//_//de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i lam zab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas/_da ni las dang po pa'i sgom pa bskyed pa'i rim pa du ma bshad par bya ba'i phyir/_de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/
[\[27b.4\]]zhes gsungs te/_ci zhig 'chad pa yin zhe na/_'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor pa/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_rgyud dgu'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa lha sgom pa bla na med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de yang don du dang ldan zhe na/_sgrub pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa
[\[27b.5\]]dang /_gnas dang sgrub pa'i thabs dang thun mong gi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /_khyad par gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/_/de la yan lag gi gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na ste/_yid du 'ong ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas mgon po thams cad kyi bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o/_/de la rnam par dben pa'i
[\[27b.6\]]gnas sam nags tshal yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'o/_/de yang mnyam sbyor las/_bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/_/lha mo so sor rang 'grub 'gyur/_/zhes bshad do/_/thabs ni sna tshogs kun du bsdus/_/zhes bya ba rten gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ston pas na/_sna tshogs kun gyi
[\[27b.7\]]phyag rgya ni/_/zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bzhi'o/_/sna tshogs kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam shes dang /_rnam shes kyi sems so/_/ji ltar bde bas bsgrub par bya/_/zhes pa ni/_'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga la ma chags pa'i sems dang stong pa nyid kyis rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar thabs
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bshad nas thun mong gi sgrub pa bshad pa ni/_stong nyid ye shes las byung ba/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dkyil 'khor la sems can gyi mos pa ni zhi ba 'am/_rgyas pa 'am/_dbang ngam khro bo'i skur snang
[\[28a.2\]]ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdag gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i ngor bstan pa ni brjod par ga la nus te mi nus so/_/de yang thabs dang shes rab kyis 'dul ba'i ngor lha bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang /_bris sku la sogs pa lha'i skur mos pa thams cad
[\[28a.3\]]dang /_sems kyi mos pas ci zhig bya zhe na/_sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir te/_gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa dang sbyar nas/_rgyud dgu'i brjod bya bstan pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par snang ba ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa'i rdo rje can nyid gcig_/ces bya ba smos te/_don dam
[\[28a.4\]]par chos kyi sku gcig yin yang /_gdul bya'i mos pa la brten nas rigs rnam pa lnga la sogs pa bshad do/_/de ltar thun mong gi sgrub pa bstan nas/_bye brag gi sgrub pa bshad pa'i phyir/_rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin no/_/gang zhig yin zhe na/_gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa/_/zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i
[\[28a.5\]]rgyud do/_/dbyibs dang kha dog phyag la sogs/_/zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dang /_zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa dang /_zhal gsum phyag drug pa la sogs pa'o/_/sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga dang zhes bya ba lha rnams kyi bzlas pa'i bye brag go/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga rnams/_/
[\[28a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dang /_dngos gzhi'i rnal 'byor dang /_ldang ba'i rnal 'byor ro/_/de'i lan du bka' stsal pa ni/_sbyor ba tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /_dngos gzhi cho ga'i yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'o/_/de la yan lag dang po ni stong pa'i byang chub bsgom pa'o/_/gnyis
[\[28a.7\]]pa ni yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan spro ba dang bsdu ba'o/_/gsum pa ni sku rdzogs pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched kyi lha bsgom pa'o/_/de ltar dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba mdor bstan nas/_khyad par du zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom pa bstan pa ni/_mdun du raM las nyi
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ma bsgom/_/zhes bya ba ni tshogs sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs nas/_srung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba ston pa yin no/_/de yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las khro bo bcu sprul nas ra ba dang dra ba dang me 'od kyi
[\[28b.2\]]pheng ba dang /_yang na raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje de'i 'od zer gyi ra ba dang dra ba bsam pa dang /_yang na ku ku ri'i bzhin du rdo rje chen po nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nang du lha bsgom par bya'o zhes 'chad do/_/ra ba dang dra ba'i nang du lha bskyed pa'i rten yi ge e
[\[28b.3\]]las chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gru gsum bsams la/_de'i dbus su dpa' bo gcig pa'i gdan ro bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i steng du rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid 'dug ste/_de'i snying gar yi ge hUM dmar nag thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can 'od zer 'phro ba bsams la de yongs su gyur
[\[28b.4\]]ba las zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/dpa' bo de ni shes rab stong pa nyid ches che bas/_sku mdog sngon po 'ang thabs snying rje dang ldan pas na cung zad dmar ba bsgom par bya'o/_/da ni tshogs rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'khor dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste/_rdo rje las skyes rtse chen
[\[28b.5\]]po/_/zhes pa ni tshogs sogs pa'i tshe snying ga'i yi ge hUM las 'od 'phros pas tshogs sogs pa'i lha bskyed par bya ste/_rdo rje las skyes zhes gsungs pa'i phyir na spyan drangs pa dang 'od kyis snang bar byas pa ni ma yin no/_/de'i gtso bo ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'am/_zhal bzhi phyag bzhi
[\[28b.6\]]pa 'am/_zhal gsum phyag drug pa'am/_de rnams kyi lha gang bsgom pa dang mthun par bsam par bya'o/_/de la lha mo gnyis ni phyag na ri dgas kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang /_nyi ma zhes pa rang byung gi khrag dang /_chu skyes bya ba dri chu dang /_sman zhes bya ba sha chen po dang /_
[\[28b.7\]]dri zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad dang /_ro zhes bya ba chang dang /_cang te'u brdung ba dang /_'od zer 'phro bas sku la 'khyud pa'o/_/de ltar dpa' bo bsgom pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i chos kun gyi lam las rnam par grol ba lha'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/da ni 'khor dang bcas
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa bshad par bya ste/_A li las zla ba me long lta bu dang /_kA li las nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyi dbus su sa bon dang mtshan ma so sor rtog pa'i rang gi sems mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can no/_/de las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab

[\[29a.5\]]ba dang /_gnas bsrung bar byas la e gru gsum nam mkha' stong pa'i dbus su 'byung ba bzhir gyur pa las sam/_yang na 'byung ba bzhi'i steng du sngar gsungs pa lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la/_de'i steng du 'jigs byed khyo shug gi stan la mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa las

[\[29a.7\]]dang skye mched la yig 'bru bkod pas byin gyis brlab pa dang /_ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_bdud rtsi myang ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang mchod pa dang /_bstod pa byas la/_bsgom bzlas kyis skyon thun tha mar ye shes sems dpa' gshegs

[\[31a.1\]]da ni bdag nyid lhar bskyed pa bsgom par bya ste/_sems can dngos po med pa ru/_/zhes bya ba ni stong pa'i byang chub bo/_/a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bskyed nas de'i steng du tAM yongs su gyur pa las ut+pal/_de las rje btsun

[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]nas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_bdud rtsi myang ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o/_/las ci'i phyir 'khrul 'khor byed ce na/_thabs dang shes rab 'phel ba'i las la zhes bya ba smos so/_/de la sngags dgod
